sentences.sContent: The green wallpaper is the perfect complement to the old pine of the dresser.
sentences.sCn: 绿色墙纸是旧松木梳妆台的完美衬托。

remMethod.val: com(表加强) + ple(满) + ment(表物) → 填满的东西 → 互为补充的东西

trans.tranCn: 补充， 互为补充的东西； 编制名额， 装备定额； 补语
trans.tranOther: a word or phrase that follows a verb and describes the subject of the verb. In ‘John is cold’ and ‘John became chairman’, ‘cold’ and ‘chairman’ are complements.
to make a good combination with someone or something else
